title.narrative: ACFID Review to Prevent Exploitation and Abuse

description.narrative: Funding under this investmentprovides matched funding raised by the Australian Council for International Development (ACFID) and its members to conduct an independent review of Australian Nno-Government Organisations' work to prevent sexual exploitation and abuse in its overseas aid projects and in their own organisations. the Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT) will work with ACFID to implement the recommendations made in this review over two years. These recommendations will aim to improve the practice and response of ACFID's members to prevent sexual harassement and exploitative behaviours in the delivery of their overseas development programs and organisations to ensure the safety and wellbeing of project beneficiaries. The total value of DFAT's contribution is $170,000 to be expensed during the 2017-18 financial year.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
